confirmDownloadCryptoWalletModalDescript: This self-custody Crypto wallet will help you to explore Web3 and crypto with peace of mind and ease.
confirmUninstallCryptoWalletModalDescrip: If you already have a Crypto wallet in use, this action erases locally saved content like dApp connections, your address book, and your watchlist. Your assets and transactions will not be affected. In addition, Crypto wallet will be removed from your browser, and you need to add it again by restarting the browser. Make sure you have your recovery phrase ready to restore access to your wallet.
